about_the_game:
STORY

"Magic may not be used to derive any form of evidence" - Magic Law, 3 years ago, Excerpt
And yet, Minnie Star dreams of becoming a magic detective. She must investigate multiple cases committed using magic to catch the culprit and prove she has what it takes to be a full-fledged detective and overcome the limitation of the law!
After a chance meeting, Minnie becomes the apprentice of Maxwell Lasnam - a famous magical detective. Always supportive, he is there to help Minnie train her detective abilities. Several rivals will also oppose you on your investigations. Face them in arguments to prove your case!

INTERROGATE

Magic culprits don’t play fair, so fight back against the lies with your own magic! Minnie's power lets her examine a witness's testimony on repeat, and expose its weak spots. However, the witness's resistance forms as bullets in this magic space, and you must dodge them to maintain your mental stamina. Use your evidence to expose the lies in each witness testimony in your search for the truth!

The difficulty of the bullet hell is customizable at any time with difficulty and customization options. Whether you have never played a bullet hell or are a danmaku veteran, there is a difficulty for you. You can even turn on infinite lives if you prefer to focus only on the story!

INVESTIGATE

Move freely around each crime scene in a top-down 2D environment and examine anything that catches your eye. You’ll find evidence that will help you confront witnesses and solve the mysteries in each case! Talk with people involved in the case to learn more about them and what they were doing when the crime occurred, each one expressed through detailed visual novel portraits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Most PCs Will Work

short_description: Find evidence, interrogate suspects, and shoot down contradictions in this magical girl detective game! Your magic turns each interrogation into a bullet hell logic battle - Use it to uncover the truth behind each magical mystery in your way!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
